alter table SNP_LPI_STEP_VAR add constraint FK_LPI_SVAR_STEP foreign key ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP ) references SNP_LPI_STEP ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP )
alter table SNP_LPI_STEP_VAR add constraint FK_LPI_SVAR_VAR foreign key ( I_LP_INST , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LPI_VAR ( I_LP_INST , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LPI_TXT_LOG add constraint FK_LPI_TXT_VLOG foreign key ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LPI_VAR_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LPI_VAR add constraint FK_LPI_VAR_LPI foreign key ( I_LP_INST ) references SNP_LP_INST ( I_LP_INST )
alter table SNP_LPI_VAR_LOG add constraint FK_LPI_VLOG_SLOG foreign key ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN ) references SNP_LPI_STEP_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_LPI_VAR_LOG add constraint FK_LPI_VLOG_SVAR foreign key ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LPI_STEP_VAR ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LOAD_PLAN add constraint FK_LP_SCEN_FOLD foreign key ( I_SCEN_FOLDER ) references SNP_SCEN_FOLDER ( I_SCEN_FOLDER )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_EXC foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP_EXCEPT ) references SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_LP foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN ) references SNP_LOAD_PLAN ( I_LOAD_PLAN )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_SCEN foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_STEP foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , PAR_I_LP_STEP ) references SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_VAR foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LP_VAR ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP_VAR add constraint FK_LP_STVAR_STEP foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP ) references SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP_VAR add constraint FK_LP_STVAR_VAR foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LP_VAR ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LP_VAR add constraint FK_LP_VAR_LP foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN ) references SNP_LOAD_PLAN ( I_LOAD_PLAN )
